author: Special Correspondent
text:
The next time you are behind the wheels of a vehicle, remember not to press the horn at the slightest urge. The campaign was launched here on Tuesday by the Young Indians of the Confederation of Indian Industry to celebrate the National Youth Week, and the Horn Not Ok Please Day. Volunteers at motor service stations will urge vehicle users to endorse the campaign by accepting a logo released for the purpose.

Vanishree Sekar, proprietor, Thriive Cars, unveiled the logo for the campaign, at Thriive Cars Salem and P. Sukumar, partner, Bangalore TVS, unveiled the logo for the campaign, at Bangalore TVS Salem.

Aravinthan, chair Yi Salem chapter; Yatin B. Shah, co-chair, and Vikgnesh Sekar, co-chair, membership engagement and members, participated in the event.
title: Horn not OK
